select a.client_account userAcct, a.client_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.e_mail mail, a.id_card_number idCard, a.client_code userId from t_client_command a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.client_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.client_account like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by a.create_time desc

select a.client_account userAcct, a.client_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.e_mail mail, a.id_card_number idCard, a.client_code userId from t_client_command a where a.is_deleted = 0 and invite_num in ( select invite_code from t_info_store where user_id = #{createBy} )
and a.client_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.client_account like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by a.create_time desc
